name: Aforgomon's Blade
text: Uses (3 Charges) [action] Fight You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you succeed, ou may spend 1 charge and exhaust Aforgomon's Blade to gain 1 action and give the attacked enemy -1 fight and -1 evade until the end of the round.

name: Gaze of Aforgomon
text: Revelation - Put Gaze of Aforgomon into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of your turn, if you have taken at least 4 actions this turn: Place 1 resource on Gaze of Aforgomon, as an offering. [action][action]: Place 1 resource on Gaze of Aforgomon, as an offering. Forced - At the end of the game, if Gaze of Aforgomon has fewer than 4 offerings on it: You suffer 1 physical trauma.

flavor: The streets are busy and garishly lit. Strange devices flit to and fro, as mechanical eyes follow your every move.
name: A Disquieting Future
text: Forced - At the end of your turn: Test [int](3). If you succeed, heal 1 damage or 1 horror. If you fail, take 1 damage and 1 horror.
back_flavor: You've found your way back to Arkham... you think. The city before you is unfamiliar to you, an oppressive vista of smoke and steel dotted with colored lights.

flavor: The streets are busy and garishly lit. Strange devices flit to and fro, as mechanical eyes follow your every move.
name: A Disquieting Future
text: Forced - At the end of your turn: Test [int](3). If you succeed, draw a card. If you fail, take 1 horror and choose and discard a card from your hand.
back_flavor: You've found your way back to Arkham... you think. The city before you is unfamiliar to you, an oppressive vista of smoke and steel dotted with colored lights.

name: Time Runs Backwards
text: Revelation - Shuffle your hand into your deck. If at least 3 cards are shuffled in this way, draw a card and add a non-exceptional card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Curse of a Thousand Winters
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, put Curse of a Thousand Winters into play in your threat area with X resources on it, where X is the amount you failed by. Forced - At the start of your turn: Lose 1 action. Remove 1 resource from Curse of a Thousand Winters. Then if there are no resources on Curse of a Thousand Winters, discard it.

name: Monastic Training
text: While Monastic Training is in your discard pile, when you reveal a [skull] token during a skill test, after this test resolves you may discard a card to add Monastic Training to your hand.

name: Chronal Atlas
text: Uses (3 secrets) You get +1 [intellect]. [react] When you would reveal a chaos token, exhaust Chronal Atlas and spend 1 secret: Reveal 2 chaos tokens instead of 1. Choose 1 of these tokens to resolve, and seal the other here. Forced - At the end of the round: Return any tokens sealed on Chronal Atlas to the chaos bag.

name: Ionian Pendant
text: [react] When you would perform a skill test during a revelation effect, exhaust Ionian Pendant and place 1 horror on it: You may use [combat] in place of the listed skill for that test.

name: Agency Strike Team
text: Choose either your location or a connecting location. Either deal 3 damage to each enemy at the chosen location, or discover 3 clues at the chosen location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Wings of Damakairon
text:
Fast. 
You get +1 [agility]. 
[fast] Exhaust Wings of Damakairon: Your location gets -2 shoud for this skill test. You may not use this ability during your turn.

name: Forestall Fate
text:
Fast. 
Uses (4 charges). 
[fast] Ekhaust Forestall Fate, spend 1 charge: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, gain an action. If a [elder_thing] or [autofail] token is revealed during this skill test, take 2 horror or lose an action.
